messages.title: My local issues are
messages.content: Zero tolerance on crime - make Sheffield’s streets safer. Flat tax - make tax simpler, no tax on minimum wage.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make tax simpler, no tax on minimum wage.
Say YES to referendums on all major issues.
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels.

issues.brexitEurope: Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels.
issues.economy: Flat tax - make tax simpler, no tax on minimum wage.
issues.governance: Say YES to referendums on all major issues.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a former magistrate in Sheffield I have strong views on law and order - protecting the innocent, and punishing the guilty. I'm a small business owner who did voluntary work as the ‘shop leader’ (manager) of Oxfam on Ecclesall Road, and helped to set up several other Oxfam shops. I am married with two sons.

politicalExperience.achievements: Strong views on law and order - protecting the innocent, and punishing the guilty.

politicalExperience.role: ‘Shop leader’ (manager) of Oxfam on Ecclesall Road
politicalExperience.achievements: Helped to set up several other Oxfam shops.

images.caption: Patricia Sullivan for Sheffield, Brightside and Hillsborough.
